ai_analysis.summary: All key fields are consistent, signature is present, and the ML risk score is minimal. No anomalies detected.

No similar fraud cases or ML‐identified indicators found.
Training data shows 45% of fraud involves amount mismatches—no mismatch here.

Call MoneyGram to validate serial number and date.
